result.title: Codeforces Problem 13C â€” Sequence
result.content:
Hi all,

Today, I was trying to solve 13C - Sequence. Though I can solve it in O(N^2), I noticed there were some O(Nlog(N)) solutions when I looked at the fastest solutions. Can anyone give an explanation of the Nlog(N) solutions?

Thanks for your time,

_light
